function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for green space quality in study design","Impact":"Inability to fully understand the impact of green spaces on mental health","Mitigation":"Include measures of green space quality in study design","Technologies":"Remote sensing, GIS mapping","People":"Researchers, public health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inability to assess individual factors due to lack of objective measurements","Impact":"Limited understanding of how individual factors influence mental health in relation to green spaces","Mitigation":"Collect objective measurements of green space quality and calculate indices","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software, survey tools","People":"Researchers, public health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"}]}
